name: David Ryan
body: This is the personal page of David Ryan. I am a researcher at [QUT](http://www.qut.edu.au). My contact information is [d...@g...l.com](http://scr.im/davidryan) (click to view email address). ## Datasets [SAIVT-QUT Crowd Counting Database](https://wiki.qut.edu.au/display/saivt/SAIVT-QUT+Crowd+Counting+Database) ## Demos [Crowd counting video.](http://www.youtu.be/1FxFAeigQT4) ## Publications ### Journals **Scene Invariant Multi Camera Crowd Counting** David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan _Pattern Recognition Letters, Elsevier, 2013_ [[Paper](http://davidryan.net.au/files/David-Ryan_Scene-Invariant-Multi-Camera-Crowd-Counting_PRL-SIPRCA-2013.pdf)] [[Elsevier](http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.patrec.2013.10.002)] ### Book Chapters **Scene Invariant Crowd Counting and Crowd Occupancy Analysis** David Ryan, Simon Denman, Sridha Sridharan and Clinton Fookes _Video Analytics for Business Intelligence, Springer-Verlag, 2012_ [[Paper](http://davidryan.net.au/files/David-Ryan_Scene-Invariant-Crowd-Counting_VABI-2012.pdf)] [[Datasets](https://wiki.qut.edu.au/display/saivt/SAIVT-QUT+Crowd+Counting+Database)] ([Springer](http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-28598-1_6)] ### Conference Papers Scene Invariant Crowd Counting David Ryan, Simon Denman, Sridha Sridharan and Clinton Fookes Digital Image Computing: Techniques and Applications, 2011 (DICTA 2011) [Paper] [Datasets] [IEEE] Textures of Optical Flow for Real-Time Anomaly Detection in Crowds David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan Advanced Video and Signal Based Surveillance (AVSS 2011) [Paper] [IEEE] Crowd Counting Using Group Tracking and Local Features David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan Advanced Video and Signal-Based Surveillance (AVSS 2010) [Paper] [IEEE] Crowd Counting Using Multiple Local Features David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan Digital Image Computing: Technqiues and Applications, 2009 (DICTA 2009) [Paper] [IEEE] Scene Invariant Crowd Counting for Real-Time Surveillance David Ryan, Simon Denman, Clinton Fookes and Sridha Sridharan International Conference on Signal Processing and Communication Systems 2008 (ICSPCS 2008) [Paper] [IEEE] Semi-Supervised Intelligent Surveillance System for Secure Environments Clinton Fookes, Simon Denman, Ruan Lakemond, David Ryan, Sridha Sridharan and Massimo Piccardi International Symposium on Industrial Electronics (ISIE 2010) [Paper] [IEEE]
